effect.en: If Beautifly has 2 or less Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If Beautifly has 3 Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned. If Beautifly has 4 or more Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep, Burned, and Poisoned.
If the Defending Pokémon has any Resistance, this attack's base damage is 60 damage instead of 30.
